reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Engaging lectures and fair grading. Highly recommended for intro biology courses.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Excellent instructor who explains complex concepts clearly. Always available for office hours.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but sometimes disorganized. Assignments can be unclear.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Passionate about the subject. Makes historical events come alive in class.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Tough but fair. Her classes prepare you well for advanced chemistry courses.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Moves too quickly through material. Not very approachable for questions.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Insightful analysis of texts. Encourages thoughtful class discussions.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but lectures can be dry. Good problem sets for practice.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Engaging lecturer who relates course material to current events. Very inspiring.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Challenges students to think critically. Assignments are thought-provoking.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Solid grasp of the subject but can be inflexible with deadlines.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Brilliant lecturer who brings complex political theories to life.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Passionate about art. Field trips to museums greatly enhance the learning experience.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Struggles to explain concepts clearly. Tests are much harder than homework.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Inspiring educator who makes you care about environmental issues.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Patient instructor who breaks down complex musical concepts well.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Interesting material but grading can be inconsistent.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Brings real-world experience to the classroom. Practical assignments.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Fascinating lectures on language structure and evolution. Highly recommended.

reviews.subject: Theater Arts
reviews.review: Knowledgeable about theater history but could improve on directing feedback.
